methods.apply:
Apply this function to the input chunk, returning an output chunk.

 The result is owned by this Context.

:param input: (io.deephaven.engine.v2.sources.chunk.Chunk<ShortToLongCastWithOffset.T>) - the chunk to transform
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.v2.sources.chunk.LongChunk<ShortToLongCastWithOffset.T>) the result LongChunk
methods.castInto:
Note: Java generics information - <T2 extends io.deephaven.engine.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.Any>

:param input: io.deephaven.engine.v2.sources.chunk.ShortChunk<T2>
:param result: io.deephaven.engine.v2.sources.chunk.WritableLongChunk<T2>
:param offset: long
methods.close: Release any resources associated with this context. The context should not be used afterwards.

text: Cast the values in the input chunk to an long and add the specified offset.
